metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10349 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The archive_le32dec function in archive_endian.h in libarchive 3.2.2 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-readand application crash) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10349` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.6
bsdtar - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.6
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-7ubuntu2.6').
